	title = "GRANDMASTER"
	foa = "GRANDMASTER_FOA"

	# Always exists
	landless = yes

	# Parent Religion/Culture
	religion = sol_sahara_reformed

	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes

	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_holysol_sahara_reformed_composition
}

d_abyssinian_band = {
	color={ 180 135 60 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 854 # Aksum
	
	mercenary = yes
	title = "CAPTAIN"
	foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"
	
	# Parent Religion/Culture 
	culture = ethiopian

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	
	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes
	
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_abyssinian_band_composition
}

d_breton_band = {
	color={ 150 65 65 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	capital = 78 # Penthievre
	
	mercenary = yes
	title = "CAPTAIN"
	foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"
	
	# Hire Trigger
	allow = {
		OR = {
			religion_group = christian
			religion_group = celtic_group
		}
	}
	
	# Parent Religion/Culture
	religion = celtic_christ
	culture = breton
	
	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
		
	# Cannot be vassalized
	independent = yes
	
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_breton_band_composition
}

# VASSAL MERCS

# Legions
d_legioluxinvicta = {
	color={ 163 10 145 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }
	capital = 517 # Constantinople
	
	mercenary = yes
	title = "LEGATUS"
	foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"
	
	# Hire Trigger
	allow = {
		OR = {
			d_legioluxinvicta = { owner = { independent = yes } }
			has_landed_title = d_legioluxinvicta
			any_vassal = { has_landed_title = d_legioluxinvicta }
		}
	}	
	
	# Parent Religion/Culture
	religion = sol
	culture = greek

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_legioluxinvicta_composition
}

	color={ 163 10 145 }
	color2={ 255 255 255 }

d_almurabitelite = {
	color={ 227 216 226 }
	capital = 954 # Marak

	mercenary = yes
	title = "CAPTAIN"
	foa = "CAPTAIN_FOA"
	
	# Hire Trigger
	allow = {
		OR = {
			d_almurabitelite = { owner = { independent = yes } }
			has_landed_title = d_almurabitelite
			any_vassal = { has_landed_title = d_almurabitelite }
		}
	}

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_cordobaelite_composition
}

			d_northumbriaelite = { owner = { independent = yes } }
			has_landed_title = d_northumbriaelite
			any_vassal = { has_landed_title = d_northumbriaelite }
		}
	}

	# Always exists
	landless = yes
	
	# Cannot be held as a secondary title
	primary = yes
	
	strength_growth_per_century = 0.5
	mercenary_type = d_angliaelite_composition
}
